q: Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. Ben Roethlisberger faced the national media for the first time yesterday afternoon at the Steelers' hotel in Fort Worth, Texas, and it didn't take long

Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. U.S. FDA and

hit 7-of-8 shots and was one of three Sixers to score 14 points. The return of Allen Iverson appeared to give Philadelphia a boost. Allen Iverson 's first game since Dec. 16 wasn't easy for the 34-year-old guard. Once Elgin Baylor got my second wind Elgin Baylor was all right. The first couple minutes Elgin Baylor thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest, said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds.
